explanation: [0-0] On a white table sits an Apple computer. On top of the computer are three paint bottles: red, blue, and green. A hand holding a yellow colored pencil is positioned above the computer.

[0-5] Subsequently, the camera zooms in as the yellow colored pencil draws a line below the Apple logo. The scene cuts to a hand holding a roll of unraveled green tape. The camera then zooms out, revealing a young man with black hair wearing a green sweater and a white beaded bracelet. He tears off the unraveled tape. The camera then zooms in, providing a close-up of the tape being torn. He then sticks the tape onto the Apple logo and peels it off again.
